# Main {#main}

### 

```{r}
DT::renderDT({
   prm <- parseQueryString(session$clientData$url_search)$species
   da <- iris[iris$Species==prm,]
   req(nrow(da)>0)
   DT::datatable(da)
})
```

# Optional {#optional}

[Subset](?species=versicolor#main)

```{r}
DT::renderDT({
   ind <- input$tbl_rows_selected
   DT::datatable(iris[ind,])
})
```
